title: The Use and Disposal of Allies
subtitle: Allies are tools, not friends. Alliances are temporary, forged for advantage and discarded when they become burdens. Use others to climb higher, but never forget that loyalty is a currency that devalues quickly. In the ruthless pursuit of power, today’s partner is tomorrow’s rival. Trust is a weakness; vigilance is survival.
